pullrequest.title: About half of the physics API documentation.

content.raw: hm, I can't find the SensorManger::Update here call in World.cc.  The problem is when a model is spawn dynamically, its sensor gets pushed into SensorManager::initSensors, and they get initialized in SensorManager::Update in a different thread, but there's no guarantee that `model->LoadPlugins()` happens after its sensor has been initialized in this case without checking SensorManager::SensorsInitialized().
content.html: hm, I can't find the SensorManger::Update here call in World.cc. The problem is when a model is spawn dynamically, its sensor gets pushed into SensorManager::initSensors, and they get initialized in SensorManager::Update in a different thread, but there's no guarantee that model->LoadPlugins() happens after its sensor has been initialized in this case without checking SensorManager::SensorsInitialized().
